Title: Relates to payment of certain awards for disability
Summary: Includes the unaccrued portion of a non-schedule award in the amounts to be payable to and for the benefit of certain persons where a claimant was entitled to death benefits at the time of death.
LawCode: Amd ยง15, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to payment of certain awards for disability
